page.title: 10DELIVERIES AND SERVICES
page.content: Milk is supplied direct from farms or by the Weardale and Cooperative Dairies. 3 coal merchants visit the area and several oil suppliers. Calor gas is supplied by agents at Lanehead and Westgate. Laundry, dry cleaning, shoe and clock and watch repairs can be left at the Co-operative Stores at Wearhead and St.John's Chapel for collection. The nearest hairdressers are at Stanhope but a travelling hair- dresser visits some houses in the area. At Ireshopeburn are agricultural engineers, an agricultural contractor and a maker of wooden gates. At Wear- head are a builder and a garage prop- rietor who does repairs, sells petrol and deals in Range- and Land Rovers. Two auctioneers sell farm stock or household goods at St.John's Chapel Mart. Barclays Bank has a branch at St.John's Chapel,open weekday mornings
